Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import ray; print\(f''Ray version: {ray.__version__}''\); ray.init\(address=''ray://localhost:10001'', ignore_reinit_error=True\); print\(''Ray connected successfully!''\); print\(f''Available resources: {ray.available_resources\(\)}''\); ray.shutdown\(\)")

Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "import asyncio; import asyncpg; async def test\(\): pool = await asyncpg.create_pool\(host=''localhost'', port=5432, database=''intellibooks'', user=''admin'', password=''devpassword123''\); async with pool.acquire\(\) as conn: print\(await conn.fetchval\(''SELECT 1''\)\); await pool.close\(\); asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)")

Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import asyncio; import asyncpg; exec\(''''''
async def test\(\):
    pool = await asyncpg.create_pool\(host=""localhost"", port=5432, database=""intellibooks"", user=""admin"", password=""devpassword123""\)
    async with pool.acquire\(\) as conn:
        print\(await conn.fetchval\(""SELECT 1""\)\)
    await pool.close\(\)
asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
''''''\)")

Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import asyncio; import asyncpg; exec\(''''''
async def test\(\):
    pool = await asyncpg.create_pool\(host=""localhost"", port=5432, database=""intellibooks"", user=""admin"", password=""devpassword123""\)
    async with pool.acquire\(\) as conn:
        print\(""Connected! Result:"", await conn.fetchval\(""SELECT 1""\)\)
    await pool.close\(\)
asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
''''''\)")

Bash(".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import asyncio; import asyncpg; exec\(''''''

    pool = await asyncpg.create_pool\(host=""127.0.0.1"", port=5432, database=""intellibooks"", user=""admin"", password=""devpassword123""\)
    async with pool.acquire\(\) as conn:
        print\(""Connected! Result:"", await conn.fetchval\(""SELECT 1""\)\)
    await pool.close\(\)
asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
''''''\)")
